Review.Titre: I called this pawn shop in Robbinsdale…
Review.Contenu: I called this pawn shop in Robbinsdale mn and specifically asked if I could pick up a pawn that had been taken out by my husband.  The customer service agent said that as long as I had my husband ID and that my ID had the same last name and address as my husband then I could pick up the pawned item. I went to the Robbinsdale mn location and attempted to do just that and was being helped by a nice man.  All of a sudden this woman came over and said "what's up " I explained that I was paying to retrieve the pawned item and she rudely said that I couldn't unless I had a marriage certificate.  I explained that I had called ahead and was told that I could show my ID and if it was the same last name and address a wife could retrieve the item.  With out looking at the matching address she said they were wrong.  Very rudely I might add. She said to tell my husband to pick up his own stuff.  I left very frustrated. Also I had come there a week earlier to pay $50 on the pawn and they would only let me pay the interest no anything extra.  Horrible service and will never go there again.

Review.Titre: Left with my item vandalized after being mistreated
Review.Contenu: Yesterday, I visited a store to sell two nearly unused guitar amplifiers with excellent condition. However, I was taken aback by the online quote they provided, valuing each amplifier at a disappointingly low price of $80. As I needed to contribute to an emergency fund, my options were limited, and I reluctantly proceeded with the transaction. Additionally, I also brought along a snowblower for evaluation.Upon arriving at the store, the staff member informed me that they would only offer $70 for both amplifiers combined, which was a letdown considering the already underestimated online quote. To make matters worse, the staff member displayed unprofessional behavior by rudely shoving the amplifiers back at me when I declined their offer. Although frustrated, I informed them about the snowblower I intended to sell.The staff member then inspected the snowblower and proceeded to search for the serial number. To my dismay, they intentionally wiped off the serial number sticker with their thumb, rendering it illegible. Despite having recognizable traces of ink and mud on their thumb, they asserted that they could not accept the snowblower without a serial number. This deliberate act of tampering with my personal property can be considered vandalism, preventing its sale anywhere else. Importantly, these incidents were witnessed by two individuals accompanying me.As a customer of various establishments for over three decades, I have never encountered such mistreatment and disregard for professionalism as I experienced at this store.

Lastly, I do want to say I’m very happy with the other jewelry I purchase and this rating does not reflect all stores et cetera. Kindest regards, James

They said if I factory reset it, it may work. I did that and it still didn’t work. So it wasn’t a great experience. The only reason I’m not giving it 0-1 stars is because the employees were very respectful and helpful, and the shipping was fast, and because I understand they aren’t really able to test everything when accepting a used laptop. Sure I could just went to the store down the road and ask darling Susan if she would clean it up for me , but isn't that what the sending store (Rochester) should have done before even thinking about putting in the box, do they need the sales or the commission that bad they cannot take a few minutes to clean a small piece of jewelry up.  The condition of the ring was fair, although one of the bagette sapphires had been replaced with a stone that did not match, shabby work. I know it is used but the inside edges were pretty pitted out, so lots of wear , not just gently worn.  Good thing I did not use that big $20 coupon on this purchase or I would really be out🙃 So now the question, there another ring online I like , do I drive 50 miles across the city to save myself a headache or take a chance.......I hate headaches.  Don't be in such a hurry to get that sale out the door, look at the product, it that what you want to get in the for your hard earned money🥵😈😓💩

Review.Titre: I purchased a Oculus Quest 2 that was…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Oculus Quest 2 that was advertised as a 256 GB hard drive. About 17 days after I received it I went into my settings to see how much memory I had left after downloading all the games I wanted in uploading my accounts to it only to find out that I in fact did not buy a 256 GB hard drive I actually bought a 128 GB hard drive and of course it was after my 15-day return time unfortunately so a long story short I bought a used Oculus Quest 228 GB which retails for about $250 to $300 for $250 not the Oculus quest to with a 256 GB hard drive that retails for $350 to $400 for $250. I unfortunately feel like I was ripped off and Powerless to do anything about an item I purchased that was falsely advertised prior to buying the Oculus I did not know how to check the amount of memory that the unit had and honestly I didn't think that I needed to because after reading reviews for Pawn America I was confident that I would receive the item that was advertised and unfortunately when I did discover that I had not received the item that was advertised it was passed my 15-day return time period so if anyone else purchases an Oculus or any other item that has a advertised amount of memory you can check to make sure by going in to the settings and going to the storage and there it will tell you how much memory you have used out of the amount of memory you have. Hopefully this will help someone else from the disappointment I experienced. I don't think that I will be doing any more business with Pawn America at least through the website if I do it will be in one of their locations that I can physically go to so I can see and inspect the item that I will purchase to eliminate having to hope that I receive the item that I have thought to have purchased. But on a positive note I did receive the item in a decent amount of time it was packaged great and the item worked great as well unfortunately I only have half the amount of memory I was supposed to have on it and there is no way to add memory to the unit nor can I buy an external hard drive to help with that problem.

Review.Titre: Great shipping service...But products not so much
Review.Contenu: To begin Pawnamerica is very quick as far as making a purchase and then my item shipped the same exact day, so that I will day was very good. BUT, the product I bought... not so much. I did know buying a “Used MacBook” from a pawn shop was kind of iffy to begin with, but I said hey let me give it a shot cause I’ve seen some decent reviews and I only needed the computer for basic functions. To start the computer was the same exact one in the pictures and the description read it was in “Good Working Condition” , not so much.  When I turned on the computer it came on fine but when I started to use it , it kept shutting and restarting when I would click on different apps. I looked up troubleshooting and decided to just bring it to a Apple store because they’d know more than me. Well.... to begin Apple store technician let me know the battery on it would need replacing and that it also needs another new part that would cost about $500 and that was “If they could even send it because the style MacBook was on the older side to where it may be obsolete”. The technician plugged in my computer and ran some diagnostics and found out that the computer was actually obsolete and the product numbers didn’t match. So long story short the previous owner replaced the bottom of the MacBook with a newer cover in order to sell it that shows a different product number (than what the actual computer was saying because the original bottom showed the obsolete product number and it won’t sell). I’m not sure if the store was aware of this before listing it but hopefully no one runs into this problem. I will now be buying a newer MacBook from the Apple Store.

Review.Titre: The web description lied
Review.Contenu: I saw a power washer on the website.  I tried to use the phone link to ask a couple of questions,  but after listening to their Covid response messages (five minutes) I pressed 1 and got "I didn't understand " and the message started over.  After three times listening to this I went to the store myself.  No place on the website  does it say the retail sides are closed, nor on the message i got to listen to thee times.   Ok.. I fully understand that these are strange times and unusual situations, nobody had plans for this.  The man at the pawn counter did his best to answer my questions but  informed me I could not pay at the store, it had to be online.  Seemed strange to me but new laws mean new issues.  He gave me a more direct number to the online sales person.  This rep also thought that the store could take payment. He called the manager and the purchase had to be made on the website.   Fine.  I pulled up the site on my phone and made the purchase while standing in the store.  At this point a person I assume is the manager comes out of the back to rather rudely inform me that the purchase must be made online.  I said, "I understand.  I have just made the purchase. The sales rep said that if you called him he could confirm the payment so I won't have to wait an hour for the normal conformation to come through.  Would you be willing to do that?"  She said, "Well who did you talk to?!"   I replied, "Sorry, I didn't catch their name.  It is the person you just spoke to about this. "   She came back with, "well I spoke with two people!"  I gave a shrug as I couldn't really help with that.  She walked back into the back area, and after 10 minutes or so returned. "This is the only time I will do this! From now on you will have to wait the hour to get the item!"  She gets the pressure washer on a hand truck,  wheels it out to the public area sets it down and says "here you go." So I get to handle the dolly with my bare hands, she had gloves.  That virus message I got to listen to really came back.  I thought she would at least get it to the parking lot.  Ok then... so I load up and head home.  Now for a list of why I wrote this. 1. No information on the retail side being closed.  Online only so no way to check the items before purchasing.  (With all the Corona virus stuff, I give this a soft pass.)2. Phone system messed up.  Come on this can be checked.3. To make a purchase you have to create an account with no way to opt out of receiving offers. What happened to I give money you give thing.4. I give you money and then I have to wait an hour to receive my purchase?  What is the point of a conformation code?5. Attitude of the boss.  Look, I know that this is a messy situation.  I did my best to be understanding, you have to follow the rules.  But I did what was asked and didn't deserve this kind of service.  I have never had this much lip while trying go give someone money.6. The web ad lies.  In the description it was listed as coming with a power broom and soap blaster. It didn't.   This is what I had questions about.  In all the confusion I didn't check.  This is why I wanted to see it before purchase.  Oh well. Lesson learned.  Dont trust the pawn america website. Two stars for the counter person and the phone rep.  They did ther best, and I am grateful for their customer service skills.

Review.Titre: Not the best experience but not the worst!
Review.Contenu: What I ordered was a present for my son's 17th birthday. He had been wanting this one particular thing for his computer for months but it was very expensive brand new. I found the exact model of what he wanted at Pawn America and it came with the extra component that would have cost an extra $60 to buy.  The whole bundle was very affordable and we were so excited to be able to buy it for his birthday. When it came out was in wonderful condition but it did not include the power cable to actual be able to plug it in to power it on. So my son couldn't play with the birthday present he had been excited for months about.  I was very upset and I called the actual pawn shop it came from and the young lady that answered and addressed my issue was so sweet, there was no way I could of took my frustrations out on her. She explained that they did not have the size power cord needed for my sons gift but that she would explain the entire situation to the district manager and have him call me the next day to discuss what could be done. While I waited for the manager to call, we found a power cord from a printer that worked temporarily and my sister ordered the needed replacement cord from Amazon. So all in all everything turned out OK. I could have showed my butt about the issue with the district manager but I didn't want the young lady from the pawn shop to even remotely get in trouble because of how very kind she was. I would order from Pawn America in the future I'll just be more careful and call to make sure everything needed will be shipped.

Review.Titre: One of the controllers were broken
So I have a mixed review beware of Fridley.
Review.Contenu: So I have a mixed review, we have done business with them for years. We ordered a ring online from Duluth and it was damaged and the return process was great. The people ( online department and Duluth stores)were friendly and wonderful, Most of the stores are great.Yet your fridley store however is a mixed bag. One of the managers put that anything I buy from them is final sale. I have had returns in the past due to items not working out or not being what I thought. That's the problem with buying used you never know what your gonna get. I have a ring on layaway. That I won't be able to finish paying off and according to them I can't get my money back. I can't even get store credit.I get done telling me I could purchase it and then pawn it/ return. (Mind the fact that I needed to cancel because we don't have money to purchase) then Pawn America will make more money off of me.So they're making over $400 OFF ME either way.. I haven't even technically purchased the item. I understand small restock fee but $400 plus dollars is theft! I can't finish the layaway because I had to buy a new car so I can get to work so all the money had to go to that instead. I feel like this manager has a personal vendetta against me. They make me feel like dirt. They left me on hold for over 11 min.Considering all the money we have spent at pawn America over the years , this is made to feel like a cheap shot at us. You may save money compared to a jewelry store or best buy but save your sanity and do business with people who have some  integrity! They make money off of other people's misfortunes. If you are doing business with them go to any store but Fridley! Horrible horrible experience! If I do need anything it won't be from fridley.Update: They did return my money today, I appreciate that. So this issue was resolved. I do not however appreciate getting a lecture about return policies etc. While I will continue to do business with Pawn America I plan to avoid this store. Thank you for finding a resolution to this matter.

Review.Titre: Product works and is as advertised
Review.Contenu: Product works and is as advertised. Minor constructive criticism. The price of the item was $0.01 below free shipping threshold but ended up qualifying for free shipping. Clarifying that would help avoid time looking for additional items to get over threshold. Also, item (as advertised) had some gooey residue on it. It would have taken limited time for you to use some goo be gone on it and made the item more attractive. I can understand the desire not to mar the item but even just using a damp cloth could have probably done it rather than leaving it for the consumer to do themselves. Again it was as advertised so no complain there, just a suggestion.Item was received timely and was packaged appropriately. Would definitely look for similar such items in the future. Great price was definitely a factor in making this purchase!

Will definitely be purchasing other items from this online store. I gave 4/5 stars because shipping states 1-2 business days and the tracking number was not accurate. Review.Titre: Listed as 14k gold... but received 10k gold!!! Honest mistake
Review.Contenu: I purchased a religious pendant and it was supposed to be 14 karat gold but when I received it it was marked 10 karat gold so please ask questions before purchasing. Updated 12/16/19 Someone from the company did reach out to me and an apology was issued and they gave me a $20 coupon off my next order so I do believe it was an honest mistake therefore I’m changing my review because I have done business with them plenty of times before with no issues.

Review.Titre: Good experience with return
Review.Contenu: I would give 5 stars for the customer experience I had with my return. It was a great experience. The reason I’m giving 4 stars is because the description of the item both online and when I called the store was extremely inaccurate. That being said, they handled my return very well

Review.Titre: The website is in need of usability improvements, but customer service was good.
Review.Contenu: The website is okay, but there was difficulty fitting to my phone screen so I couldn’t see a lot at once when navigating. After I added a card for payment, I saw that I must have fat-thumbed the delivery method and I couldn’t go backward in the checkout process to adjust it. Fortunately, there was an email option. A customer service person got back to me immediately and shipped the item right away. Everything else was great, including the condition of the product I purchased and fast shipping.

Review.Titre: First purchase.
Review.Contenu: This was my first purchase ever from Pawn America and I bought my camera online.  It was packed very well and I got my camera two days later which was on time.  The camera is in almost mint shape.  I think Pawn America did a very nice job describing the camera and I think the price was good too.I went to register the camera on the company's website.  I wasn't expecting to do this but I was able to do it.  Very pleased with Pawn America.

Review.Titre: Jewelry price review
Review.Contenu: I buy jewelry from here off and on and am usually quite pleased as the pieces are as described and they come polished and in great condition. The customer service is quite good as well. The only problem I see when looking through the selection would be the pricing. About half the prices are in my opinion priced appropriately where the other half are as much as retail new if not more. I think a bit more time on pricing would be a plus as they are pre owned. Overall a great shopping experience though.

Review.Titre: Pawn America shop in WI is only  3…
Review.Contenu: Pawn America shop in WI is only  3 hours away  ( driving) from my house in NW sub IL...I was waiting for my ring 4 days..Was shipped 1st class, the cheapest and slowest, and its took 4 days !!!!I can't believe it... The distance from shop to my house 3 hours to drive...Not happy about that.But Ring is Beautiful, I love it..Thanks any way...4 stars....

Review.Titre: Associates are amazing!
Review.Contenu: I’ve had bumpy experience with Pawn America in the past, but the new associates make me want to come back more frequently! In particular, the associate Liz, is phenomenal! She helped me when I really needed it!

They were very helpful and everything has gone exceptionally smooth, we purchased it online and received it two days later, took it to our local branch to purchase the lifetime warranty which to me makes pawn america just as good if not better than the jewelry stores as the warranty is second to none, thanks pawn america!

Everything was nice, but on the picture that is on the website it showed a controller that had an army print on it, which i thought I’d be receiving with the consule..Instead it was just a basic black controller that has the grips on the sticks ripped off but works totally fine. I mean it’s fine but just don’t expect it to come totally like the picture they advertise for whatever ur buying.

It does appear in the pictures… So?

Although I don't wish to return the product because a dry-cleaning and a few nights with dryer sheets left the purse smelling pleasant, I do appreciate the offer for a return.

Chose PawnAmerica because they offered free shipping, shipping info was never requested.  Later had to cancel order because PawnAmerica only ships to buyer address listed on credit card. Changes need to be made to this policy. I canceled my order and sent money to family member to order and have shipped to them.  The next customer may not be as patient....  What if someone else purchases as a gift and wants to have shipped to someone other than themselves?  Changes Need To Be Made To This Policy...

Review.Titre: Happy Customer

The Switch I decided on was very reasonably priced and had a detailed description with multiple pictures. Checkout was easy, and shipping was FREE!!  It arrived a few days later exactly as described (near new condition) and was packed securely in a nice, solid box. The only complaint I have is regarding the shipping information. I wasn’t emailed a tracking number and their website didn’t offer a good/easy way to track my order/package. I’m still not sure which currier delivered it?... Overall  it was a great experience I would be happy to repeat!

Review.Titre: Quirky online software but great once it worked!
Review.Contenu: Once their online software finally took my card information, it was fine. I tried repeatedly on a Friday after 5 p.m., and it refused to take my credit card. It finally gave me a message that the item I was trying to buy was sold.I suspected it was because I had tried so many times to order it! The online system says they only take orders from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Friday, which seems weird for an online system.On a whim, I tried it again the following Monday and was able to order the same item with no problems. Glad I was persistent. This was a very unusual item and considered as new in the box (Tactacam video camera for gun or bow). They did a nice job of packaging it and didn't charge excess postage (only about $8).

Review.Titre: PAWN AMERICA Canceled my order

The necklace I purchase was advertised for sale for $274.99 and after they canceled my purchase they relisted the item for $849.99 I believe that is called bait and switch. (2-14-2020)    I purchased a pair earrings that I thought my nephew would like and I  used the $20 coupon that Pawn America provided, after the purchase Pawn America reached out to me and offered to give me a more expensive pair of earrings for the same price, so I gladly accepted. They try their best to make up for their mistakes, After all we are human and mistakes happen and this is why I’m changing my review.

I thought this was great customer service and my worry about this place started to decline. Once I got the item. It was completely functional and in amazing condition. I will definitely be offing from American Pawn again.

How could this be any better?

The camera and the accessories were all in new condition with no wear, scratches or even fingerprints! I could not be any happier with the entire purchase from the service to the condition of the products.  I will be checking Pawn America in future for any online purchases and will not hesitate to recommend them any time the opportunity arises!  Thank you all for a pleasant experience!

Review.Titre: Great first experience with Pawn America
Review.Contenu: After searching online for an Xbox Series S, I came across one from Pawn America that was a good deal. I then called to make sure the details about the item were correct. The call rep I spoke with was pleasant and answered all my questions. He even ensured me that if I had any problems upon receiving the item, to give them a call back and they would take care of it. After making the purchase online, I received a confirmation email that included a tracking number. The item was shipped same day and arrived to me in the exact time frame it was scheduled to be delivered. It came packaged very well with the Xbox in it's original box, packed inside of a larger brown shipping box. The item was just as described and I am very happy with my purchase. I will definitely be doing business with Pawn America in the future after they showed that they do things decently and in order.
